Comment: This response provides a solid overview of how God introduces Himself using His name in the Bible, focusing on the significance of the name Yahweh and other names and titles that reveal God's character. Good job in highlighting the eternal nature and self-existent being of God through the name Yahweh and in mentioning other important names and titles used in the Bible to help us understand God's attributes and relationship with humanity.
